GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

APP_DATE.title: Date of Request
APP_DATE.instruction:
Enter the date you are submitting this form in DD-MM-YYYY format.
Example: '25-12-2023'

ACCOUNT_NO.title: Your Account Number
ACCOUNT_NO.instruction:
Enter your IDFC Bank account number from which the money should be deducted.
Example: '100012345678'

CUST_NAME.title: Customer Name
CUST_NAME.instruction:
Enter your full name as per bank records.
Example: 'RAJESH KUMAR'

REQ_TYPE_SETUP.title: Section A: Request / Setup Details
REQ_TYPE_SETUP.instruction: Fill this section ONLY if you want to START a new standing instruction. (Leave blank if cancelling).

BENEFICIARY_NAME.title: Beneficiary Name
BENEFICIARY_NAME.instruction:
Enter the name of the person/company receiving the money.
Example: 'HDFC LOAN ACCOUNT' or 'SUNITA SHARMA'
rejections: Setup selected but Beneficiary Name missing

BENEFICIARY_ACC_NO.title: Beneficiary Account Number
BENEFICIARY_ACC_NO.instruction:
Enter the account number where the money will be sent.
Example: '001122334455'
rejections: Setup selected but Beneficiary Account missing

AMOUNT.title: Amount (in Figures)
AMOUNT.instruction:
Enter the exact amount to be transferred each time.
Example: '15,000'

AMOUNT_WORDS.title: Amount (in Words)
AMOUNT_WORDS.instruction:
Write the amount in words.
Example: 'FIFTEEN THOUSAND ONLY'

IFSC_CODE.title: IFSC Code
IFSC_CODE.instruction:
Enter the 11-digit IFSC code of the Beneficiary Bank.
Example: 'HDFC0001234'

START_DATE.title: Start Date
START_DATE.instruction:
Enter the date when the first payment should happen (DD-MM-YYYY).
Example: '05-02-2024'
rejections: Setup selected but Start Date missing

END_DATE.title: End Date
END_DATE.instruction:
Enter the date when the last payment should happen (DD-MM-YYYY).
Example: '05-02-2025'
rejections: End date is before Start date

FREQUENCY.title: Frequency
FREQUENCY.instruction:
Tick how often the payment should be made.
Options: 'Weekly', 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', etc.
rejections: Setup selected but Frequency not ticked

REQ_TYPE_CANCEL.title: Section B: Cancellation Details
REQ_TYPE_CANCEL.instruction: Fill this section ONLY if you want to STOP an existing standing instruction.

CANCEL_BENEFICIARY_NAME.title: Beneficiary Name (For Cancellation)
CANCEL_BENEFICIARY_NAME.instruction:
Enter the name of the beneficiary for the instruction you want to stop.
Example: 'SUNITA SHARMA'
rejections: Cancellation selected but Beneficiary Name missing

CANCEL_BENEFICIARY_ACC.title: Beneficiary Account No (For Cancellation)
CANCEL_BENEFICIARY_ACC.instruction:
Enter the account number of the beneficiary to identify the instruction to stop.
Example: '001122334455'
rejections: Cancellation selected but Account No missing

CANCEL_REASON.title: Reason for Cancellation
CANCEL_REASON.instruction:
Briefly state why you are cancelling.
Example: 'LOAN CLOSED' or 'SERVICE STOPPED'

SIGNATURE_1.title: 1st Account Holder Signature
SIGNATURE_1.instruction: The primary account holder must sign here to authorize the setup or cancellation.

SIGNATURE_2.title: 2nd Account Holder Signature
SIGNATURE_2.instruction: If the account is joint, the second holder must sign here.

SIGNATURE_3.title: 3rd Account Holder Signature
SIGNATURE_3.instruction: If there is a third holder, they must sign here.
